steps.name: Make sure all checkboxes are unchecked
Click on the element By.cssSelector: table thead th .Polaris-Checkbox
Wait for the element By.cssSelector: table thead th .Polaris-Checkbox to be visible
Make sure all checkboxes are checked
Click on the button with text "Hủy" inside the modal {By.xpath: //h2[contains(text(),'Tạo đơn nhập hàng')]/ancestor::div[contains(@class, 'Polaris-Modal-Dialog__Modal')]}
Assert that the modal located by {By.xpath: //h2[contains(text(),'Tạo đơn nhập hàng')]/ancestor::div[contains(@class, 'Polaris-Modal-Dialog__Modal')]} is closed
